name: Razorback`s Spined Mantle
description: "Stitched together from the carcass of Razorback."

name: Guardsman`s Spaulders
description: Your stubborn will to live can save you even from the most dire blows. Requires a shield.

name: Astral Mantle
description: Retaliates with an orb of lightning launched in the attacker`s direction, damaging and stunning all in its path.

name: Stormscorched Shoulderguards
description: "Not even the fury of a hundred storms was enough to shatter this armor."

name: Grenadier Shoulderguard
description: "Seared and shredded by shrapnel, this shoulderguard nevertheless retains much of its protective qualities."

name: Mantle of the Weeping Eye
description: "Symbolic garment of a secretive order eradicated during the reign of the Arcanist King, Samuel Drake."

name: Wraith Knight`s Pauldrons
description: Tear open a rift to the beyond, unleashing a well of restless spirits that will tear at any enemy that dares enter it.

description: Spill the blood of the heathens that dare stand in your way.
